snippet: New York City Schools Chancellor Dennis M. Walcott reprimands Lenny Speiller, the Department of Education’s director of public affairs, for his actions regarding the insertion of political views into a petition for parents.
lead_paragraph: New York City Schools Chancellor Dennis M. Walcott reprimands Lenny Speiller, the Department of Education’s director of public affairs, for his actions regarding the insertion of political views into a petition for parents.
